statement.name: UPDATE_SMADBI
statement.sql: UPDATE SMADBI SET SMTPSM = ? ,AGADBI = ? , SMADBI = ? ,PGSDBI = ? , PGTDBI = ? ,RZPDBI = ? , RZKDBI = ? ,RZIDBI = ? , ATCDBI = ? ,PBKDBI = ? , MPBDBI = ? ,TPODBI = ? , STDDBI = ? ,CODOFR = ? , INSDBI = ? ,CODBAS = ? , NGRBAS = ? ,PLNDBI = ? , JNDDBI = ? ,STDPLN = ? , IDEUNV = ? WHERE CODDBI = ?

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAPRS
statement.desc: Actualizacion de la tabla de personas
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAPRS SET NACPRS = ?,FHNPRS = ?, EPSPRS = ?,SNGPRS = ?, CIVPRS = ?,SEXPRS = ?, DIRPRS = ?,TELPRS = ?, CELPRS = ?,IDECIU = ?, EMLPRS = ?,PSWPRS = ?, EXPPRS = ?,ESKPRS = ?, ESTPRS = ?,SNPPRS = ?, NROXVT = ?,PSNPRS = ?, PNOPRS = ?,SNOPRS = ?, PAPPRS = ?,SAPPRS = ?, BROPRS = ?,ZNAPRS = ?, DISPRS = ?,VTOPRS = ?, MILPRS = ?,NRMPRS = ?, NDMPRS = ?,DIFPRS = ?, TEFPRS = ?,SBNPRS = ?, TRJPRS = ?,TDIPRS = ?, NRIPRS = ?,APEPRS = ?, NOMPRS = ?,CODPRS = ?, IDEPRS = ?,FHXPRS = ? WHERE NROPRS = ?

statement.name: INSERT_SMADBC
statement.desc: Insercion en la tabla de Datos complementarios
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMADBC ( NRODBC, CODCIA, NROPRS, VULDBC, ETNDBC, RSGDBC, VCTDBC, SBNDBC, STRDBC, SCTDBC, DISDBC, CAPDBC, HNSDBC, POSDBC, HESDBC, SDYJFE, JOBJFE, FMLDBC, DPNDBC, CNVDBC, DOMDBC, SQLBKR ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

statement.name: UPDATE_SMADBC
statement.desc: Actualizacion en la tabla de Datos complementarios
statement.sql: UPDATE SMADBC SET VULDBC = ? , ETNDBC = ? , RSGDBC = ? , VCTDBC = ? , SBNDBC = ? , STRDBC = ? , SCTDBC = ? , DISDBC = ? , CAPDBC = ? , HNSDBC = ? , POSDBC = ? , HESDBC = ? , SDYJFE = ? , JOBJFE = ? , FMLDBC = ? , DPNDBC = ? , CNVDBC = ? , DOMDBC = ? , SQLBKR = ? WHERE NROPRS = ?

statement.name: INSERT_SMADBS
statement.desc: Insercion en la tabla estudios basicos

statement.name: UPDATE_SMADBS
statement.desc: Actualizacion en la tabla estudios basicos
statement.sql: UPDATE SMADBS SET IDEKLG = ?, ESKDBS = ?, BGNDBS = ?, ENDDBS = ?, JNDDBS = ?, CALDBS = ?, CARDBS = ?, ESPDBS = ?, METDBS = ?, IDMDBS = ?, VLRDBS = ?, VALDBS = ? WHERE NROPRS = ?

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAICF
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAICF SET SNPICF = ?, PTJICF = ?, FCHICF = ?, CODCIU = ?, TPOIDE = ?, PSTICF = ?, NRIPRS = ?, NROXVT = ? WHERE NROICF = ?

statement.name: INSERT_SMADBZ
statement.desc: Insercion en la tabla de datos financieros

statement.name: UPDATE_SMADBZ
statement.desc: Actualizacion en la tabla de datos financieros
statement.sql: UPDATE SMADBZ SET FMSDBZ = ?, APRDBZ = ?, NGSDBZ = ?, VIVDBZ = ?, DUVDBZ = ?, NPRDBZ = ?, NBRDBZ = ?, STEDBZ = ?, QCEDBZ = ? WHERE NROPRS = ?

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAPIN
statement.desc: Actualizacion en la tabla de pines
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAPIN SET NROPRS = ?, CODDBI = ?, STDPIN = ? WHERE NROPIN = ?

statement.name: INSERT_SMAEMS
statement.desc: Insercion en la tabla de email
statement.sql: Insert into SMAEMS (NROEMS,CODCIA,CODDIV,TPOEMS,FCHEMS, FHEEMS,FHVEMS,FRMEMS,TO_EMS,CC_EMS, BCCEMS,MSGEMS,TXTEMS,ATTEMS,CODPRS, TPOPRS,STDEMS,KNDSRV,TPOSRV,CODSRV, SQLBKR) values (?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?, ?)

statement.name: INSERT_SMADBR
statement.desc: Insercion en la tabla de examenes ICFES
statement.sql: Insert into SMADBR ( NRODBR , NROXVA , NROPRS , VLRDBR , PTJDBR , MAXDBR , RESDBR , SQLBKR ) values (?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?)

statement.name: DELETE_SMADBR
statement.desc: Delete en la tabla de examenes ICFES
